name: Dark Neumorphism UI Tesla app
description:
Hi there,


Here's my Tesla app with Dark Neumorphism mixed with a sort of Glassmorphism style.I really enjoyed creating Soft design and explored new trends, new technique, etc.


In the Figma file, you'll have the templates about Neumorphic buttons with different style in light and dark mode.You'll also have the Home screen template with basic elements. I'll add the Climate screen and Charge screen soon. So stay tuned ;)


Hope you'll like it and please support me with the "L"
